title: Turtle Knight Society
body:
Hello my name is Obi and i am apart of the League of Legends division in Turtle Knight Society (TKS). We are looking for members to join our community and if some people want to then we shall do ranked teams if you would like. We first have some rules that we STRICTLY FOLLOW

1.18+
Be 18+, that simple

2.NO BM
This is something that myself and the rest of the community take to heart. We DO NOT, Tolerate any type of BM. Straight up ban if a situation occurs.

3.You wont be denied if your low elo
With this, don't be BM to any low elo players. This fits in with rule 3 as well.

Come into the TS or Add me on league where we can talk about getting you recruited!
Ts link: turtleknightsociety.teamspeak3.com
IGN: Obi Wanna Blowmi

replies.body: Hello just copying the guy above me yet putting some in my own words I am looking for a fun community to play with and enjoy league again. Just messaging for game-play and friendly experience.

I am interested, Silver II (i continually wobble between s2 and s4) mid mage main.

I have been looking for a mature community in league for a while, futilely. Everything down at this ELO seems to be a smurf, a wannabe smurf, or a salty kid half my age.

Is TS a requirement? I have never managed to get it to function with tolerable (ie comprehensible) quality, and have no headset (bad feedback loops).
